get.description: Get messages between 2 users or within a team

post.description: Create and send a message either to another user or to a team

parameters.description: The message request (this is only for documentation purposes, the actual request should be either DirectMessageRequest or TeamMessageRequest)
parameters.name: request

get.summary: Connect the user to the message WebSocket

get.description: Get teams - all teams, by name, or by prefix with limit

post.description: Create a new team with the provided details

put.description: Add a user to a team by providing user ID and team ID
put.summary: Add a user to a team

400.description: Bad Request: Invalid request body or missing userId or teamId

delete.description: Delete a user from a team by providing team ID
delete.summary: Delete a user from a team

400.description: Bad Request: Invalid request body or missing userId or teamId

put.description: Update team details by providing team ID and updated details

delete.description: Delete a team by providing team ID

post.description: Accepts either `email` or `username` along with `password`. Returns an access token and the full user (without password).
post.summary: Login user by email or username and return JWT

parameters.description: The login request (email or username + password)
parameters.name: request

parameters.description: The user profile update (all fields optional)
